name: Miss Priss
description:
A game about a little girl who is trying to marry one of her stuffed animals until a green monster, the Bulk, kills him and now she is out for revenge!

Use mouse to aim, click to shoot. WASD to move and jump/fly Shooting/Flying/Damage are all part of the same pool of energy. Any of those actions will deplete it.

Link To Ludum Dare Page

Update 1.1 - Fixed NPE, now game actually starts. But broke boss fight, fix incoming

Update 1.2 - Removed some code/effects originally for debugging that were causing some erratic behaviors

Update 1.3 - Removed some energy code/effects used for testing

Update 1.4 - Fixed some tiles, moved some enemies that were getting stuck in walls

Update 1.5 - Fixed an NPE when hero dies, still fixing final scene

Update 1.6 - Fixed boss scene, the game can now end

Update 1.7 - Working on .exe for better performance
